body_html:
Hi Lukas,

I have documented the bug here. Please let me know if it is not clear. :)
In short, the outputs of the two functions (for which I have changed the comments) do not return tensors of size (batch_size, num_decoder_symbols) but rather of size (batch_size, output_size) where output_size is the same parameter as documented for the function embedding_rnn_decoder
body_text:
Hi Lukas,
I have documented the bug here. Please let me know if it is not clear. :)
In short, the outputs of the two functions (for which I have changed the comments) do not return tensors of size (batch_size, num_decoder_symbols) but rather of size (batch_size, output_size) where output_size is the same parameter as documented for the function embedding_rnn_decoder
body:
Hi Lukas,

I have documented the bug [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/3800). Please let me know if it is not clear. :) 
In short, the outputs of the two functions (for which I have changed the comments) do not return tensors of size `(batch_size, num_decoder_symbols)` but rather of size `(batch_size, output_size)` where `output_size` is the same parameter as [documented for the function](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/seq2seq.py#L252) `embedding_rnn_decoder`
